typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Year as string,
		{Title;} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesADLS
MoviesADLS select(mapColumn(
		ID,
		Year,
		Title = {Title;}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(Year) > 2018) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Title = dropLeft(dropRight(toString(Title),1),4)) ~> DerivedTitle
DerivedTitle sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
